cz.upol.inf.vanusanik.ministag.ui.filters

Class SecurityFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.upol.inf.vanusanik.ministag.ui.filters.SecurityFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter

    public class SecurityFilter
extends Object
implements Filter
    Handles the security of the application. Checks whether user is logged in for each section of website and if not, redirects to the login. If incorrect user is logged in, redirects to index.xhtml.
    Author:
    enerccio
